graph_title: Proportion of members and voting rights of developing countries in international organizations
indicator_name: Proportion of members and voting rights of developing countries in international organizations
indicador_disponible: The Basque Country does not produce continuous official statistics using the indicator methodology.
justificacion_global:
The UN is based on a principle of sovereign equality of all its Member States 
(Article 2, UN Charter). Thisindicator aims to measure the degree to which States 
enjoy equal representation in international organizations. 

Source: United Nations Statistics Division

es.indicador_disponible: The Basque Country does not produce continuous official statistics using the indicator methodology.
es.justificacion_global:
La ONU se basa en el principio de igualdad soberana de todos sus Estados Miembros 
(Artículo 2 de la Carta de la ONU). Este indicador busca medir el grado de 
representación equitativa de los Estados en las organizaciones internacionales.

Fuente: División de Estadísticas de las Naciones Unidas
